definition: this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
past this village, you won't find this shop (idiom)/this is your last chance
pinyin: guo4 le5 zhe4 ge5 cun1 jiu4 mei2 zhe4 ge5 dian4
containing_words.word: 过了这个村就没这个店

definition: past this village, you won't find this shop (idiom)/this is your last chance
pinyin: guo4 le5 zhe4 ge5 cun1 jiu4 mei2 zhe4 ge5 dian4
containing_words.word: 过了这个村就没这个店

sentences.english: Show all articles on this topic.
sentences.chinese: 显示所有关于这个主题的文章。

sentences.english: Many disaster will happen every day in the world.
sentences.chinese: 在这个世界上，天天都邑发生很多灾难性的工作。

sentences.english: He pillaged the country of its treasures and of its best people.
sentences.chinese: 他掠夺了这个国家的财富和百姓中的精英。

sentences.english: The positive side effect is, that the seed of Roridula can be stored for many years.
sentences.chinese: 这个特性，可以让捕虫树的种子保存数年。

sentences.english: This was the call Susan worked so hard to receive.
sentences.chinese: 这个电话对苏珊来说是得之不易的。

sentences.english: Shows how to open a port and communicate wih other computers.
sentences.chinese: 这个程序演示了打开一个端口，并和其它计算机通信。

sentences.english: This splendid region of mountains and valleys contains many wonderful hot springs.
sentences.chinese: 这个风景英俊山区和上庄储藏着很多温泉。

sentences.english: Who make you mushroom so late, the whole ruddy blood temple you this hour equitable obtain up.
sentences.chinese: 谁让你起得这么晚，整个赤血宫就你这个时辰才起床。

sentences.english: Bll the boys laughed to hear the good news.
sentences.chinese: 听见这个好动静然后，所有的男孩都笑了。

sentences.english: The city is noted for its handicrafts. Population, 745,000.
sentences.chinese: 这个城市以手工艺品著名。

sentences.english: They said the targe was out of reach.
sentences.chinese: 他们抱怨说这个目标无法达成。

sentences.english: Have you ever known there are such creatures as an albino two-headed snake?
sentences.chinese: 你知道这个世界上有一种叫做双头白化蛇的生物吗？

sentences.english: The reason Burundi is so poor is because they have never really had any peaceful time between the everlasting civil wars.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家贫穷的真正原因是因为连绵不绝的内战。

sentences.english: Someone you least expect could be trying to make you look bad.
sentences.chinese: 有人可能会想让你出丑，这个人是你意想不到的。

sentences.english: Change that arrangement and you can dramatically alter the resulting organism.
sentences.chinese: 改变这个排列你就能完全改变最后的生物体。

sentences.english: Our supplies for this month are in the cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 我们这个月的生活用品在橱子里。

definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
